DOC.brief_summary: Background Objectives : All modern surgical procedure require high level cognitive psychomotor skill achieve use different training method , could influence fatigue psychological factor . We evaluate effect warm-up exercise operative laparoscopic performance gynecologic laparoscopic procedure . Methods : The surgical team operate consecutive series 20 patient perform laparoscopic salpingo-oophorectomy . Patients randomly allocate 2 group : group A operate without warm-up exercise group B operate short-term warm-up . All patient operate surgical team . The full-time record operation analyze 2 independent reviewer . Laparoscopic procedure record assessed 2 independent observer use generic OSATS rating scale . A training module use Lap Sim simulator design warm-up .
DOC.criteria: resident faculty Dept . Gynecology Obstetrics complete skill train
